title: Horizon Forbidden West Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.30.21
description:
Greg and Blessing come together to talk about Horizion Forbidden West getting delayed, when you're getting Destiny 2 cross-play, and if you got a PlayDate yesterday!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:50 - Housekeeping
Our video message to Henry is up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
The movie crew is reviewing Jungle Cruise today, and it’ll be up on youtube.com/kindafunny soon!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:50 - Will Horizon Forbidden West Get Delayed? Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:31:20 - Destiny 2 Season 15 Will Add Cross-Play, Saniya @ GameSpot
00:36:00 - Official Horizon Delay: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-07-30/playstation-video-game-horizon-forbidden-west-delayed-to-2022
00:37:20 -  Ad
00:47:55 - Annapurna Interactive Wrap-Up
00:53:10 - PlayDate Had a Hell of a Preorder Campaign, Greg Kumparak @ Tech Crunch
01:01:30 - Out today
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUE: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and IMRAN KHAN!
THURS: TimTam?
FRI: Greg and Tim
